slides.title: Blockhain Based Blue Carbon MRV
slides.desc: Blockchain and AI/ML-powered MRV system for blue carbon projects, enabling transparent carbon credit issuance.

slides.title: MERN STACK JOB PORTAL
slides.desc: Built a full-stack job portal with JWT authentication and role-based dashboards for HR and candidates. Automated resume handling, test assignment, and candidate shortlisting using scalable REST APIs.

slides.title: Real-Time Chat Application
slides.desc: Developed a WhatsApp-like real-time chat application using Socket.IO for low-latency messaging. Integrated Firebase Storage for secure media sharing and optimized backend performance for concurrent users.
